body_html: This should be fixed by 8852be3. The fix will appear in TF 1.7; in the meantime unfortunately you'll have to add a tf.identity(zeros) around any tensors that are (i) captured from an external scope, and (ii) returned directly from a TF function (in Dataset.map(), Dataset.filter(), etc.).
body_text: This should be fixed by 8852be3. The fix will appear in TF 1.7; in the meantime unfortunately you'll have to add a tf.identity(zeros) around any tensors that are (i) captured from an external scope, and (ii) returned directly from a TF function (in Dataset.map(), Dataset.filter(), etc.).
body: This should be fixed by 8852be3ed15e11071d6807b61294d36168be693c. The fix will appear in TF 1.7; in the meantime unfortunately you'll have to add a `tf.identity(zeros)` around any tensors that are (i) captured from an external scope, and (ii) returned directly from a TF function (in `Dataset.map()`, `Dataset.filter()`, etc.).
